name: gobrain
description: This document has the purpose to specify the architecture of [this](https://xd.adobe.com/view/e5a9d78f-bae8-4fe1-43ce-4ab2e2c67ea0-9398/?fullscreen) web application, using React and Redux. The architecture should specify the following items: - **Separation of modules:** What criteria should be used to group modules by. - **Module comunication:** To whom should modules comunicate with and how should this comunication happen. - **Folder structure:** How should the project's modules be organized, and where should new modules be placed.

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && github-markdown ./readme.md > public/index.html && cp *.svg public/
